It's a really love/hate relationship with this game. It's comparable to a toxic relationship where sometimes it annoys you, beats you up mentally, kills every being of your soul and you want to break up with her but when you finally decide you're done and you are about to leave her, she says she loves you and you just stay because you think things will finally change but it never does.
